channel.title: Andrew's Blog
channel.description: Feed of new posts from Andrew's Blog

item.title: Navigating the web! Book Club: Don't Make me Think - Chapter 6
item.description: On the internet we magically teleport from page to page. Making sure the navigation on your website is strong is the best way to handle this magical journey.
item.author: Andrew Nolan

item.title: Omit needless words! Book Club: Don't Make me Think - Chapter 5
item.description: Don't Make me Think Chapter 5 - Omit Words.
item.author: Andrew Nolan

item.title: Don't Make me Click?! Book Club: Don't Make me Think - Chapter 4
item.description: Today we take a look at Chapter 4 of Don't Make me Think, Krug's Second Law of Usability, "it doesn't matter how many times I have to click, as long as each click is a mindless, unambiguous choice."
item.author: Andrew Nolan

item.title: Man vs Machine! Predicting the Academy Awards
item.description: Is Machine Learning better than a human at predicting the winners of the Academy Awards? I trained a few basic machine learning models to test this out.
item.author: Andrew Nolan

item.title: Designing Billboards! Book Club: Don't Make me Think - Chapter 2 and 3
item.description: This week we read Chapters 2 and 3 of Steve Krug's classic book on design, Don't Make me Think and discuss classic user behaviors and designing our sites like billboards to make them easier to scan.
item.author: Andrew Nolan

item.title: Book Club: Don't Make me Think - Chapter 1
item.description: Let's read and talk about the Introduction and Chapter 1 of Steve Krug's classic book on design, Don't Make me Think.
item.author: Andrew Nolan

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: The first ever entry to Andrew's blogs, please enjoy!
item.author: Andrew Nolan
